QuestData.Title: Spirits of the Water
QuestData.Description: Our war against the hozen rages without end, and the future of our tribe is uncertain.$B$BThis is why our waterspeaker has decided to seek wisdom from the waters.$B$BElder Lusshan is waiting. Please deliver the instruments so that they may begin.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Elder Lusshan and witness the waterspeaking ceremony.
QuestData.RewardText: I saw the vision, $n. What do you think it means?$B$BI think it is clear that you play some part in it.
